full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,YE SHES MGON PO NAG PO CHEN PO DANG, MGON DKAR YID BZHIN NOR BU GNYIS LA GSOL BA 'DEBS TSUL MYUR MDZAD DGONGS BSKYED CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B DE LTAR MYUR MDZAD YE SHES KYI MGON PO'I CHE BA RNAMS MGON PO NYID KYIS THUGS BSKYED TSUL DANG, RJE BTZUN 'JAM DBYANGS KYIS RJE BLA MA DANG, GRUB CHEN MI TRI BAS KHYUNG PO DANG, MGON PO NYID KYIS DPAL LDAN SHA WA RI BA LA GSUNGS PA RNAMS SO, ,MGON DKAR GYI CHE BA KHYUNG PO'I SGRUB YIG @005A *, ,SOGS SU BYUNG BA RNAMS TSIGS SU BCAD PAR BSDEBS PA'I YE SHES MGON PO NAG PO CHEN PO DANG, MGON DKAR YID BZHIN NOR BU GNYIS LA GSOL BA 'DEBS TSUL MYUR MDZAD DGONGS BSKYED CES BYA BA 'DI NI, MYUR MDZAD THUGS RJE CAN 'DIS MTSON PA'I LHA SNGAGS KYI CHE BA JI LTAR YOD TSUL DPE LA LUS PA LAS YID DU 'JIGS PA MED PAR RANG MYONG GIS GRUB PAS RKYEN BYAS, DAD PA'I GSOL 'DEBS SU RE BAS BCOL CHUNG ZHING GIS BRIS PA STE, MYUR MDZAD THUGS RJE CAN GYIS RJES SU 'DZIN PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG ,'DI NI CHOS RJE NGAG DBANG RDO RJE'I GSUNG RTZOM LAGS,,
